channel.description:

item.title: Halo 4 Leaked
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I know this thread is about the leaked version, but I guess I will go ahead and give my opinion on how I think the game will be.

There are some positives to the game (If you read up on Halo 4, you may think the negatives greatly outweigh the positives)

[ul][li]Cool Assassinations.[/li]
[li]BR is back.[/li]
[li]The Bloom for the DMR is no where near as bad on reach, so the effects are not much different.[/li]
[li]The Thruster pack seems very good, almost a weaker evade, which is good because the evade was too OP in reach, the thruster pack seems perfect[/li]
[li]Spawns have improved a lot.[/li]
[li]When your dead, you can’t look around at your cam anymore.[/li]
[li]The clan system seems to be returning. (Clan battles as a playlist?)[/li]
[li]Been confirmed that there will be no ordinance or Instant Respawn in normal playlists. Just Infinity Slayer and Regicide.[/li]
[li]Lots of ammo in each weapon.[/li][/ul]

This is just what I have came across whilst researching the game. I recommend pre-ordering this game, as I have!

Read full topic
